attributes.action: Introduce Government accommodations for international students can help GDP.
attributes.additional_details: I think it can increase the employment in many cities and many Universities has not enough rooms in their campuses,So its the right time for the Govt. to take a good action that can help increase economy.
attributes.background: As we can see that international students are now showing much interest to study in UK then before.The UK govt. can initiate a students home or students room as same as university accommodation cost with some new features like bicycle access to the students with few charges.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about student accommodation are a matter for individual universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
